title: Update site headers to use new monochrome logo assets

requirements.text: Update the authenticated app header logo to use the new monochrome logo files in `frontend/public` (`/logo-mono-white.png` for light mode and `/logo-mono-dark.png` for dark mode), and set the rendered logo height to 80px with automatic width.

quotes: Make the site actually use the new logos… replace the current with one (or both) of these… src="/logo-mono-white.png" … src="/logo-mono-dark.png" … style={{ height: "80px", width: "auto" }}

acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/components/Header.tsx`, the header logo `` uses `src="/logo-mono-white.png"` when the resolved theme is light and `src="/logo-mono-dark.png"` when the resolved theme is dark.
The logo is displayed at 80px height and preserves aspect ratio (width auto).
The light-mode logo `alt` text is exactly "EcoPowerHub AI" and the dark-mode logo `alt` text is exactly "EcoPowerHub AI (dark)".

requirements.text: Update the marketing site header logo to use the same new monochrome logo files (`/logo-mono-white.png` for light mode and `/logo-mono-dark.png` for dark mode) with a height of 80px and automatic width.

quotes: Open src/App.tsx (or wherever your header/logo lives) and replace the current with one (or both) of these… src="/logo-mono-white.png" … src="/logo-mono-dark.png"

acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/components/MarketingHeader.tsx`, the logo `` uses `/logo-mono-white.png` in light mode and `/logo-mono-dark.png` in dark mode (using existing theme logic).
The marketing header logo is displayed at 80px height and preserves aspect ratio (width auto).
The rendered logo `alt` text matches the same strings as the app header: "EcoPowerHub AI" (light) and "EcoPowerHub AI (dark)" (dark).

constraints: Do not edit any files under `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, or `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose existing components instead).
Do not introduce new authentication providers; Internet Identity remains the only auth method.
nonGoals: Regenerate or visually enhance the logo PNGs (no ImageMagick/logo v2 work in this change).
Fix or replace corrupted full-color logo assets (e.g., `logo-main.png`).
Add new theme system behavior beyond selecting the correct logo for the already-existing light/dark theme resolution.
